issue.title: [Release] Fix Windows wheel RC verification script given lack of "m" ABI tag in Python 3.8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7780](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7780). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Python 3.8 wheels don't have the "m" postfix in their ABI tag.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7780?focusedCommentId=17031611) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6364
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6364>
